author: nuts0

changelog.release_notes: v1.4 The way of indication was changed. When a bluetooth stste change,it vibrates.

name change 24hr-Bricks 
use custom font
add back color
bugfix
v1.2 5-8-2015 change backcolor by swing pebble time.

description:
for Pebble Time latest Firmware.

I thing that must be most conscious in the display of the watch was minute.
In order to visualize the hour,dividing 24 hours by 4 sides.
A day Beginning from left below brick. 
It's increasing to the top from there.
I think most people may generally live as follows.
The brick in the left indicates sleeping time.
The brick in the top indicates before noon.
The brick in the right indicates after noon.
The brick in the bottom indicates time of night.

v1.4 The way of indication was changed. When a bluetooth stste change,it vibrates.
v1.3 name change 24hr-Bricks use custom font add back color and some bugfix 
v1.2 4 backcolor selectable by swing watch. axis x direction is increase. and axis y direction is decrease.
